attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This app was the WORST app I have ever downloaded. I was hoping to find more information on Trump to educate me on whether or not I should vote for him, but I was very disappointed when I just found a load of bull on the app. If he canâ€™t even run an efficient app then how can we trust him to run this country. Truly disappointed in this.

attributes.title: THIS APP WILL NOT MAKE AMERICA GREAT!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I am a true Orange crescent roll supporter. And I have to say I am very disappointed. The app took a very long time to download and took up most of my phone space. When I opened the app my car immediately went up in flames in my front yard and caught my house on fire burning all of my Trump flags :( I CAN NOT recommend

attributes.title: My house is gone
attributes.review: This app took a long time to download, but whatever. When I was finally able to open it, it had me sign up with my name and address. Within a couple hours, a missile hit my house and exploded everything. Iâ€™m planning on suing and my legal team is already prepared. I have nothing. Thanks a lot, Trump.
